title: 1. A person crosses a 600 m long street in 5 minutes. What is his speed in km per hour?
2. An aeroplane covers a certain distance at a speed of 240 kmph in 5 hours. To cover the same distance in 1 hours, it must travel at a speed of:
3. If a person walks at 14 km/hr instead of 10 km/hr, he would have walked 20 km more. The actual distance travelled by him is:
explanation: Let the actual distance travelled be x km

title: 4. A train can travel 50% faster than a car. Both start from point A at the same time and reach point B 75 kms away from A at the same time. On the way, however, the train lost about 12.5 minutes while stopping at the stations. The speed of the car is:
explanation: Let the speed of the car be x kmph.
Then, speed of the train = (150/200)x = (3/2)x kmph

title: 5. Excluding stoppages, the speed of a bus is 54 kmph and including stoppages, it is 45 kmph. For how many minutes does the bus stop per hour?
explanation: Due to stoppages, it covers 9 km less
Time taken to conver 9 km = ((9/24)*60) min = 10 min

title: 6. In a flight of 600 km, an aircraft was slowed down due to bad weather. Its average speed for the trip was reduced by 200 km/hr and the time of flight increased by 30 minutes. The duration of the flight is:
explanation: Let the duration of the flight be x hours
=> x = 1 hr [neglecting the -ve value of x]

title: 7. A man complete a journey in 10 hours. He travels first half of the journey at the rate of 21 km/hr and second half at the rate of 24 km/hr. Find the total journey in km.
8. The ratio between the speeds of two trains is 7 : 8. If the second train runs 400 km in 4 hours, then the speed of the first train is:
explanation: Let the speed of two trains be 7x and 8x km/hr
Speed of the first train  = 7 * 12.4 km/hr = 87.5 km/hr

title: 9. A man on tour travels first 160 km at 64 km/hr and the next 160 km at 80 km/hr. The average speed for the first 320 km of the tour is:
10. A car travelling with  of its actual speed covers 42 km in 1 hr 40 min 48 sec. Find the actual speed of the car.
explanation: Time taken = 1 hr 40 min 48 sec = 1hr 40(4/5) min = 1(51/75) hrs = 126/75 hrs
Let the actual speed be x km/hr

title: 11. A cyclist covers a distance of 3 km in 5 minutes. What is the cyclist’s speed in km/hr?
12. If a train running at 72 km/hr crosses a bridge in 40 seconds, find the length of the bridge.
13. A boat covers 16 km downstream in 2 hours and returns in 4 hours. Find the speed of the stream.
14. A man can row 8 km/hr in still water. If the speed of the current is 2 km/hr, find his effective speed downstream.
15. The distance between two cities is 300 km. If a car takes 5 hours to cover this distance, what is its average speed?
16. A plane flies 1500 km in 3 hours. How long will it take to fly 2000 km at the same speed?
17. If a person saves 15 minutes on a journey by increasing speed from 60 km/hr to 75 km/hr, find the distance covered.
explanation: Time difference = Distance / Old speed - Distance / New speed

title: 18. A car covers 100 km in 2 hours. If it increases its speed by 20%, how much time will it take to cover the same distance?
19. A train 400 m long crosses a pole in 20 seconds. What is the speed of the train?
20. If a man can walk 20 km in 4 hours, how far can he walk in 7 hours at the same speed?
21. A cyclist increases his speed by 25% and covers a distance in 2 hours instead of 3 hours. What was his original speed?
22. A 500 m train crosses a platform of the same length in 50 seconds. Find its speed.
23. A car travels 60 km in 2 hours. What is its speed?
24. A man walks 100 meters in 2 minutes. What is his speed?
25. A train covers a distance of 200 km in 5 hours. What is its speed?
26. A car travels 100 meters in 20 seconds. What is its speed in m/s?
27. A person runs 300 meters in 30 seconds. What is their speed?
28. A bus travels 120 kilometers in 3 hours. What is its speed?
29. A plane flies at a speed of 800 km/hr. How much distance will it cover in 2.5 hours?
30. A cyclist rides 25 km in 1 hour. What is their speed in m/s?
explanation: Convert 25 km to meters: 25 km = 25,000 meters
